name: Rhubarb Slush
author: BJSCHOENHERR
summary: This is a refreshing spring time beverage. It is also a great way to use up all that fresh rhubarb. Alcohol is optional.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 (6 ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, chilled
directions: Place rhubarb in a large saucepan with water to cover
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, and cook until tender
Drain and mash or puree in a blender
Stir together the rhubarb puree, sugar, orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, gin and water
Place scoops of the frozen mixture into serving glasses, and fill the rest of the glass with lemon-lime soda
